00029 AppPlaceholderItem::AppPlaceholderItem(ProgramEntityItem* parent) : QGraphicsRectItem(parent),
00030                                                                     parent_(parent)
00031 {
00032     Q_ASSERT(parent_ != 0);
00033 
00034     //setFlag(ItemIsSelectable);
00035     setRect(-WIDTH / 2, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);
00036     setPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::DashLine));
00037 
00038     QGraphicsTextItem* label = new QGraphicsTextItem(this);
00039     label->setHtml("<center>Drag an <b>Application</b> from the library OR double-click to create new</center>");
00040     label->setTextWidth(WIDTH);
00041     label->setPos(-0.5 * label->boundingRect().width(), 4);
00042 }
